summary: "Back to Black," Amy Winehouse's second album, came out in 2006. It was inspired by her on-off relationship with Blake Fielder-Civil. The album combines 1960s soul music with modern R&B. It was very popular and won many awards, including a Grammy for Best Pop Vocal Album. It also helped make British soul music more popular. The album sold over 20 million copies worldwide and is considered one of the best albums ever made.
title: Back to Black
